features.name: debug_mode
features.description: Enables kernel debugging mode.

features.name: verbose_logs
features.description: Increases kernel logging verbosity.

features.name: bbr
features.description: Enables BBR congestion control algorithm.

features.name: swappiness
features.description: Adjusts the swappiness value to control swap usage.

features.name: transparent_hugepages
features.description: Controls Transparent Huge Pages (THP) for memory management.

features.name: iommu
features.description: Enables IOMMU (Input-Output Memory Management Unit) support.

features.name: scheduler_performance
features.description: Sets CPU scheduler to performance mode.

features.name: kernel_task_scheduler
features.description: Optimizes the kernel task scheduler for low latency.

features.name: disk_io_scheduler
features.description: Sets the disk I/O scheduler to 'mq-deadline' for better performance.

features.name: irqbalance
features.description: Distributes interrupt requests (IRQs) across multiple CPU cores.

features.name: filesystem_compression
features.description: Enables filesystem-level compression, reducing disk space usage but potentially affecting performance.
features.command_enable: [[ $(findmnt -n -o FSTYPE /) == btrfs ]] && ! mount | grep ' / ' | grep -q 'compress=' && sudo mount -o remount,compress=zstd / || echo 'Compression not supported or already enabled.'
features.command_disable: [[ $(findmnt -n -o FSTYPE /) == btrfs ]] && mount | grep ' / ' | grep -q 'compress=' && sudo mount -o remount,nocompress / || echo 'Not using Btrfs or compression is already disabled.'

features.name: preload
features.description: Enable preload to speed up application startup times.
features.command_enable: sudo pacman -S --noconfirm preload && sudo systemctl enable --now preload
features.command_disable: sudo systemctl disable --now preload && sudo pacman -R --noconfirm preload

features.name: systemd_boot_opt
features.description: Optimize systemd boot time by enabling parallel startup and disabling unnecessary services.
features.command_enable: sudo systemctl enable systemd-analyze-boot-opt && sudo systemctl mask systemd-networkd-wait-online
features.command_disable: sudo systemctl unmask systemd-networkd-wait-online && sudo systemctl disable systemd-analyze-boot-opt

features.name: numa_balancing
features.description: Enables NUMA (Non-Uniform Memory Access) balancing to optimize memory allocation on multi-socket systems.

features.name: dirty_ratio_adjustment
features.description: Adjusts the kernel's dirty ratio and dirty background ratio to control disk write caching behavior.
features.command_enable: sudo sysctl -w vm.dirty_ratio=10 && sudo sysctl -w vm.dirty_background_ratio=5
features.command_disable: sudo sysctl -w vm.dirty_ratio=20 && sudo sysctl -w vm.dirty_background_ratio=10

features.name: tcp_congestion_cubic
features.description: Enables the Cubic TCP congestion control algorithm. (Alternative to BBR)

features.name: timer_granularity
features.description: Adjusts the system timer granularity to reduce latency in certain applications.

features.name: wake_on_lan
features.description: Enables Wake-on-LAN functionality for a specific network interface.

features.name: entropy_generation_haveged
features.description: Improve entropy generation by enabling haveged.
features.command_enable: sudo apt install haveged -y && sudo systemctl enable --now haveged
features.command_disable: sudo systemctl disable --now haveged && sudo apt remove haveged -y

features.name: entropy_generation_haveged_arch
features.description: Improve entropy generation by enabling haveged.
features.command_enable: sudo pacman -S haveged --noconfirm && sudo systemctl enable --now haveged
features.command_disable: sudo systemctl disable --now haveged && sudo pacman -R haveged --noconfirm
